title: The Queen in Canada, 1964
creator_credit: Gordon Sparling, Nicholas Balla and ONF | NFB
brief_description: A hundred years earlier, the Fathers of Confederation gathered in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island, to discuss the idea of a united Canada. In October, 1964, Queen Elizabeth and the Duke of Edinburgh came to commemorate that event and the conference at Quebec City that followed it.
